anya-e0804n2:45_2: niggahītāgamassa vasena “saṅkati khañjatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti, tathā imasmiṁ rudhādigaṇe

anya-e0804n2:45_4: vasena “muñcati kantatī”tiādīni rūpāni bhavanti. Evaṁ sante ko imesaṁ tesañca visesoti?

anya-e0804n2:45_7: nipphannarūpā bhavanti, na katthacipi tesaṁ vinā niggahītāgamena rūpappavatti dissati.
anya-e0804n2:45_8: Taṁ yathā? Saṅkati, saṅkā, khañjati, khañjo iccādi. Ayaṁ anekassarānaṁ ikārantavasena
anya-e0804n2:46_0: Ye ca rudhādigaṇasmiṁ anekassarā asaṁyogantvā akārantavasena vā ukārantavasena vā
anya-e0804n2:46_1: niddiṭṭhā, te ākhyātattaṁ patvā suddhakattuvisayeyeva ekantato niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā
anya-e0804n2:46_2: bhavanti, na hetukattuvisaye. Nāmikattaṁ pana sahaniggahītāgamena vinā ca niggahītāgamena
anya-e0804n2:46_3: nipphannarūpā bhavanti. Yattha vinā niggahītāgamena nipphannarūpā, tattha sasaṁyogarūpāyeva
anya-e0804n2:46_4: bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? Muñcati, muñcāpeti, moceti, mocāpeti. Chindāpeti. Chedeti, chedāpeti.

anya-e0804n2:46_6: attano, sāmaṁ ukkacca khādasi iccādīni. Tattha ukkaccāti ukkantitvā, chinditvāti attho.

anya-e0804n2:73_0: Ruca rocane. Rocanaṁ ruci. Bhattaṁ me ruccati. Bhattampitassa na ruccati. Pabbajjā
anya-e0804n2:73_1: mama ruccati. Ruccituṁ, ruccitvā. Keci pana imasmiṁ divādigaṇe “ruca dittimhī”ti
anya-e0804n2:73_2: paṭhanti. Taṁ na yuttaṁ katthacipi dittisaṅkhātasobhanatthavācakassa rucadhātuno
anya-e0804n2:73_3: “ruccatī”ti rūpābhāvato. Tasmā evaṁ sallakkhetabbaṁ, dittirucīnaṁ vācako rucadhātu
anya-e0804n2:73_4: bhuvādigaṇiko. Tassa hi “rocati, virocati. Ekattamuparocita”nti rūpāniyeva bhavanti,
anya-e0804n2:73_5: na “ruccatī”ti rūpaṁ. Ruciyāyeva vācako pana divādigaṇikopi hoti curādigaṇikopi.
anya-e0804n2:73_6: Tassa hi divādigaṇikakāle “gamanaṁ mayhaṁ ruccatī”ti rūpaṁ. Curādigaṇikakāle “kiṁ
anya-e0804n2:73_7: nu jātiṁ na rocesī”ti rūpaṁ. Āpubbo ce ācikkhane vattati, “āroceti, ārocayatī”ti rūpāni dissanti.
anya-e0804n2:74: Muca mokkhe. Dukkhato muccati. Saddhāya adhimuccati. Mutti, vimutti, adhimutti, muccamāno.
anya-e0804n2:75: Uca samavāye. Uccati. Oko, ūkā, ukkā.
anya-e0804n2:76: Okoti udakampi āvāsopi. “Okapuṇṇehi cīvarehī”ti ca, “vārijova thale khitto, okamokatamubbhato”ti cettha payogo. Ūkāti sīse nibbattakimiviseso.
anya-e0804n2:77_0: Ukkāti dīpikādayo vuccanti. “Ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsū”ti hi āgataṭṭhāne dīpikā “ukkā”ti
anya-e0804n2:77_1: vuccati. “Ukkaṁ bandheyya, ukkaṁ bandhitvā, ukkāmukhaṁ ālimpeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne aṅgārakapallaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:77_2: “Kammārānaṁ yathā ukkā, anto jhāyati no bahī”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṁ. “Evaṁ
anya-e0804n2:77_3: vipāko ukkāpāto bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhāne vātavego “ukkā”ti vuccati. “Saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṁ
anya-e0804n2:77_4: gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānaṁ mūsā “ukkā”ti veditabbā. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:81: Che chedane. Chiyati, chiyanti. Avacchitaṁ, avacchātaṁ. Chetvāna moḷiṁ varagandhavāsitaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:82: Saja saṅge. Saṅgo laganaṁ. Sajjati. Sajjanaṁ, sajjito, satto.
anya-e0804n2:83: Yuja samādhimhi. Samādhānaṁ samādhi, kāyakammādīnaṁ sammāpayogavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Yujjati. Yogo, yogī.
anya-e0804n2:86: Passāmi vo’ha’mattānaṁ, yathā icchiṁ tathā ahu”nti
anya-e0804n2:87: Vacanato avassaṁ kātuṁ yujjati upapajjatīti yogoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:88_0: Ranja rāge. Rajjati. Virajjati. Rajjamāno, rajjaṁ, rajjanto, rāgo, virāgo, rajjanaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:88_1: virajjanaṁ, rajanīyaṁ. Upasaggavasena añño attho bhavati. Samhā raṭṭhā nirajjati,
anya-e0804n2:89: Tattha virāgoti virajjanti ettha saṁkilesadhammāti virāgo, nibbānaṁ maggo ca.
anya-e0804n2:90: Vijī bhayacalanesu. Vijjati, saṁvijjati. Saṁvego, saṁvejanīyaṁ. Ubbijjati. Ubbego, ubbiggahadayo.
anya-e0804n2:91: Lujavināse. Lujjatīti loko. Lopo, lutti, lujjanaṁ, lutto.
anya-e0804n2:92: Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṁ. Ṭhāyati. Ṭhāyī, ṭhiti, ṭhānaṁ, ṭhito, tatraṭṭho, tiṭṭhaṁ, kappaṭṭhāyī, āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyī.
anya-e0804n2:95: Pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Lāpaṁ gocaraṭṭhāyinanti ca. Tattha ṭhāyāmīti tiṭṭhāmi.
anya-e0804n2:96: Ḍigatiyaṁ. Ḍiyati. Ḍemāno. Ḍino vā. “Ucce sakuṇa ḍemāna, pattayāna vihaṅgama. Vajjesi kho tvaṁ vāmūru”nti nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:98: Tā pālane. Tāyati. Aghassa tātā. So nūna kapaṇo tāto, ciraṁ rujjati assame. Tāṇaṁ, parittaṁ, gottaṁ. Tvaṁ khosi upāsaka katakalyāṇo katabhīruttāṇo.
anya-e0804n2:99: Tatra parittanti mahātejavantatāya samantato sattānaṁ bhayaṁ upaddavaṁ upasaggañca tāyati rakkhatīti parittaṁ, gaṁ tāyatīti gottaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:100: Nata gattavināme. Gattavināmo gattavikkhepo. Naccati. Naccaṁ. Nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto.
anya-e0804n2:101: Dā sodhane. Dāyati. Dānaṁ. Anuyogadāpanatthaṁ. Anuyogaṁ datvā. Dānaṁ datvā.
anya-e0804n2:102: Dāsupane. Dāyati. Niddāyati. Niddāyanaṁ, niddāyamāno, niddāyanto.
anya-e0804n2:103_0: Dādāne. Puriso dānaṁ dāyati. Āpubbo gahaṇe. Adinnaṁ ādiyati. Sīlaṁ samādiyati. Kamme
anya-e0804n2:103_1: – purisena dānaṁ dīyati, adinnaṁ ādiyati. Kārite – ādapeti, samādapeti, ādapayati,
anya-e0804n2:105: Ettha ca parittanti samantato khaṇḍitattā parittaṁ. Appamattakañhi gomayapiṇḍaṁ parittanti vuccati. Tasmā parittanti appakassa nāmaṁ kāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa appesakkhattā.
anya-e0804n2:106: Dā suddhiyaṁ. Dāyati. Vodāyati. Vodānaṁ. Akammakoyaṁ dhātu. Tathā hi “vodāyati sujjhati etenāti vodānaṁ, samathavipassanā”ti nettisaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:108: Tatra dīnoti parikkhīṇañātidhanādibhāvena dukkhito. Ādīnavotiādīnaṁ dukkhaṁ vāti adhigacchati etenātiādīnavo, doso.
anya-e0804n2:110: Bhidi bhijjane. Bhijjanadhammaṁ bhijjati. Bhijjatīti bhinno. Bhijjanaṁ bhedo.
anya-e0804n2:111: Chidi chijjane. Suttaṁ chijjati. Chijjatīti chinno. Evaṁ chiddaṁ. Chijjanaṁ chedo.
anya-e0804n2:112: Khididīniye. Dīnabhāvo dīniyaṁ, yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Khijjati, khinno, akhinnamati, khedo, khedaṅgato lokahitāya nātho.
anya-e0804n2:113: Ettha khedaṅgatoti kāyikadukkhasaṅkhātaṁ parissamaṁ patto, dukkhamanubhavīti attho.
anya-e0804n2:114_0: Pada gatiyaṁ. Pajjati. Maggaṁ paṭipajjati. Paṭipattiṁ paṭipajjati. Addhānamaggappaṭipanno
anya-e0804n2:114_1: hoti, phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjati. Āpattiṁ āpajjati. Akammakampi bhavati, tesaṁ adhammo
anya-e0804n2:115: Ettha ca pajjoti maggo. Byagghapajje saddulapathe jātoti byagghapajjo, evaṁnāmako kulaputto. Sampadiyati ñāpiyati dhammo etenāti sampadāyo, akkhātā.
anya-e0804n2:116: Vida sattāyaṁ. Sattā vijjamānākāro. Vijjati, saṁvijjati. Jātavedo, vijjā, avijjā, vidito.
anya-e0804n2:117_0: Tattha jātavedoti aggi. So hi jātova vedayati dhūmajāluṭṭhānena paññāyati, tasmā
anya-e0804n2:117_1: jātavedoti vuccati. Vijjāti dhammānaṁ sabhāvaṁ viditaṁ karotīti vijjā, ñāṇaṁ. Avijjāti
anya-e0804n2:117_2: khandhānaṁ rāsaṭṭhaṁ, āyatanānaṁ āyatanaṭṭhaṁ, dhātūnaṁ suññaṭṭhaṁ, saccānaṁ tathaṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:117_3: indriyānaṁ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṁ aviditaṁ karotīti avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṁ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṁ
anya-e0804n2:117_4: catubbidhaṁ atthaṁ aviditaṁ karotīti avijjā, moho.
anya-e0804n2:118_0: Mada ummāde. Ummādo nāma muyha naṁ vā sativippavāso vā cittavikkhepo vā. Majjati,
anya-e0804n2:118_1: pamajjati. Matto, surāmadamatto. Matto ahaṁ mahārāja. Puttamaṁsāni khādayiṁ. Mattahatthī, pamatto, ummatto.
anya-e0804n2:119: Appamādo amataṁ padaṁ, pamādo maccuno padaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:120: Appamattā na miyyanti, ye pamattā yathā matā.
anya-e0804n2:121: Mida sinehane. Mejjati. Mettā, metti, mittaṁ, mitto.
anya-e0804n2:122: Antaradhā adassane. Antarapubbo dhādhātu vijjamānassa vatthuno adassane vattati. Antaradhāyati. Antaradhānaṁ, antaradhāyanto. Sā devatā antarahitā. Antarāpidhāyati.
anya-e0804n2:123: Budha avagamane. Avagamanaṁ jānanaṁ. Bujjhati, buddho, buddhi, buddhaṁ, bodho, bodhi. Bujjhitā saccāni. Sakalaṁ buddho, buddhavā, vibodheti, bodhetā, buddho, vibuddho iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:124_0: Tatra buddhoti bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho. Atha vā pāramitāparibhāvitāya
anya-e0804n2:124_1: paññāya sabbampi ñeyyaṁ abujjhīti buddho. Keci pana kammenapi buddhasaddassa siddhaṁ
anya-e0804n2:124_2: icchantā evaṁ nibbacanaṁ karonti “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavāti adhigataguṇavisesehi
anya-e0804n2:124_3: khīṇāsavehi bujjhitabboti buddho”ti. Vitthāro pana niddese vuttanayena gahetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:124_4: Buddhīti bujjhatīti buddhi. Evaṁ buddhaṁ bodho bodhi ca. Atha vā bujjhanaṁ buddhi.
anya-e0804n2:124_5: Evaṁ bodho bodhi ca, sabbametaṁ paññāyādhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:125_0: Idāni bodhisaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vadāma. Bodhīti hi rukkhopi maggopi sabbaññutaññāṇampi
anya-e0804n2:125_1: nibbānampi evaṁpaṇṇattiko puggalopi vuccati, tathā hi “bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti
anya-e0804n2:125_2: ca, “antarā ca bodhiṁ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne rukkho bodhīti vuccati. “Catūsu
anya-e0804n2:125_3: maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo. “Pappoti bodhiṁ varabhūri sumedhaso”ti āgataṭṭhāne
anya-e0804n2:125_4: sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ. “Patvāna bodhiṁ amataṁ asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne nibbānaṁ. “Bodhi
anya-e0804n2:125_5: bhante rājakumāro bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti “ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccatī”ti
anya-e0804n2:127: Rukkhe magge ca nibbāne, ñāṇe sabbaññutāya ca;
anya-e0804n2:130_0: Ettha ca koci payogo tumantādīni ca rūpāni vuccante – “guyhamatthamasambuddhaṁ, sambodhayati
anya-e0804n2:130_1: yo naro. Paraṁ sambuddhumarahati. Bujjhituṁ, buddhuṁ, bujjhitvā, bujjhitvāna, bujjhituna,
anya-e0804n2:130_2: buddhiya, buddhiyāna, buddhā, buddhāna” iti bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:131: Tatra asambuddhanti parehi aññātaṁ, “asambodha”ntipi pāṭho, paresaṁ bodhetuṁ ayuttanti attho. Sambuddhunti saṁbujjhituṁ. Buddhāti bujjhitvā, evaṁ buddhānāti etthāpi.
anya-e0804n2:132_0: Keci pana “nāmarūpaparicchede ‘bodhimaggena budhvā’ti ca, “budhvā bodhitale yamāha
anya-e0804n2:132_1: sugato’ti ca dhakāravakārasaññogavato padassa dassanato tvāpaccayantabhāvato ca dhakāravakārasaṁyogavasena
anya-e0804n2:132_2: “budhvā”ti padasiddhi icchitabbā”ti vadanti, taṁ tādisassa padarūpassa buddhavacane
anya-e0804n2:132_3: adassanato ca, buddhavacanassa ananukūlatāya ca, parisuddhe ca porāṇapotthake vakārasaṁyogavigatassa
anya-e0804n2:132_4: “bodhimaggena buddhā”tica, “buddhā bodhitale”ti ca padassa dassanato na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:132_5: Tathā hi na tādiso pāṭho buddhavacanassa anukūlo hotīti. Na hi buddhavacane vassasatampi
anya-e0804n2:132_6: vassasahassampi pariyesantā tādisaṁ vakāradhakārasaññogapadaṁ passissanti. Evaṁ “budhvā”ti
anya-e0804n2:132_7: padarūpassa buddhavacanassa ananukūlatā daṭṭhabbā. Tañhi sakkaṭaganthe kataparicayabhāvena
anya-e0804n2:132_8: vañcitehi vidūhi icchitaṁ, na saddhammanītividūhi. Ettha imāni nidassanapadāni veditabbāni –
anya-e0804n2:133: Ko maṁ viddhā nilīyati. Laddhā macco yadicchati. Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṁ visesaṁ, adassanaṁ maccurājassa gacche.
anya-e0804n2:136_0: Tattha viddhāti vijjhitvā. Laddhāti labhitvā. Laddhānāti labhitvāna. Diṭṭhāti disvā.
anya-e0804n2:136_1: Iti “viddhā laddhā laddhāna diṭṭhā”ti padāni tvāpaccayena saddhiṁ gatānipi saññogavasena
anya-e0804n2:136_2: vakārapaṭibaddhāni na honti, tasmā “buddhā buddhāna” iccetānipi “laddhā laddhāna”
anya-e0804n2:136_3: iccādīni viya parihīnavakārasaññogāni eva gahetabbāni. Ye “budhvā”ti rūpaṁ icchanti
anya-e0804n2:136_4: paṭhanti ca, maññe te tvāpaccayo vañceti, tena te vañcanaṁ pāpuṇanti, tasmā tādisaṁ
anya-e0804n2:136_5: rūpaṁ aggahetvā yo saddanītiyaṁ saddavinicchayo vutto, soyeva āyasmantehi sārato paccetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:137_0: Budha bodhane. Sakammakākammakoyaṁ dhātu. Tathā hi bodhanasadduccāraṇena jānanaṁ
anya-e0804n2:137_1: vikasanaṁ niddakkhayo ca gahito, tasmā “budha ñāṇe, budha vikasane, budha niddakkhaye”ti
anya-e0804n2:137_2: vuttaṁ hoti. Bujjhati bhagavā, dhamme bujjhati, pabujjhati, padumaṁ bujjhati. Puriso
anya-e0804n2:138: Saṁdhāsandhimhi. Saṁpubbo dhādhātu sandhimhi vattati. Nevassa maddī bhākuṭi, na sandhiyati na rodati. Na sandhiyatīti idaṁ aññehi pakaraṇehi asādhāraṇaṁ divādirūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:139: Dhanu yācane. Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidharassa hadayaṁ dhaniyyati. Idampi asādhāraṇaṁ divādirūpaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:141: Yudha sampahāre. Yujjhati. Yodho, yuddhaṁ, caraṇāyudho, yakārassa vakārabhāve “āvudha”nti rūpaṁ. Tatra caraṇāyudhoti kukkuṭo.
anya-e0804n2:142: Kudha kope. Kujjhati. Kodho, kujjhanā, kujjhitattaṁ. Kuddho atthaṁ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṁ na passati.
anya-e0804n2:143: Sudha soceyye. Soceyyaṁ sucibhāvo. Sujjhati. Suddhi, visuddhi, sujjhanaṁ, suddho, visuddho, parisuddho. Kārite “sodheti, sodhako” iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:145: Radha hiṁsāyaṁ. Rajjhati, virajjhati, aparajjhati. Aparādho.
anya-e0804n2:146: Rādha sādha saṁsiddhiyaṁ. Rādhayati, sādhayati. Ārādhanaṁ, sādhanaṁ. Saparahitaṁ sādhetīti sādhu, sappuriso. Accantaṁ sādhetabbanti sādhu, laddhakaṁ sundaraṁ dānasīlādi.
anya-e0804n2:147: Vidha vijjhane. Vijjhati. Paṭivijjhati. Khaṇa viddha, vidhu, vijjhanako, viddho, paṭividdho, vijjhanaṁ, vedho, paṭivedho, vijjhitvā, viddhā, viddhāna. Ko maṁ viddhā nilīyati.
anya-e0804n2:148: Idha vuddhiyaṁ. Ijjhati, samijjhati. Iddhi, ijjhanaṁ, samijjhanaṁ, iddho. Tattha iddhīti ijjhanaṁ iddhi. Ijjhanti vā sattā etāya iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti iddhi.
anya-e0804n2:149: Gidhuabhikaṅkhāyaṁ. Gijjhati, gijjho. Gaddho. Gaddhabādhipubbo. Kāmagiddho na jānāsi. Gedho.
anya-e0804n2:150: Rudhi āvaraṇe. Rujjhati, virujjhati, paṭivirujjhati. Virodhako, viruddho. Rodho, virodho, paṭivirodho, anuvirodho.
anya-e0804n2:151: Anuvidhā anukaraṇe. Anuvipubbo dhādhātu anukriyāyaṁ vattati. Puriso aññassa purisassa kriyaṁ anuvidhīyati tatrāyaṁ pāḷi –
anya-e0804n2:155: Anurudha kāme. Kāmo icchā. Anupubbo rudhadhātu icchāyaṁ vattati. Anuruddho, anurodho. Anusmāti kiṁ virodho.
anya-e0804n2:156: Tattha anuruddhoti anurujjhati paṇītaṁ paṇītaṁ vatthuṁ kāmetīti anuruddho. Anurodhoti anukūlatā. Ayaṁ pāḷi “so uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anurujjhati, alābhe paṭivirujjhatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:157: Byadha tāḷane. Byajjhati. Byādho. Byādhoti luddho. Taṁ taṁ migaṁ byajjhati tāḷeti hiṁsatīti byādho.
anya-e0804n2:159: Mana ñāṇe. Maññati, avamaññati, atimaññati. Seyyādivasena maññatīti māno. “Maññanā, maññitattaṁ, māno, ahaṅkāro, unnati, ketu, paggaho, avalepo”ti pariyāyā.
anya-e0804n2:160_0: Janajanane. Sakammakoyaṁ dhātu. “Jaññatī”timassa rūpaṁ, karotīti attho. Kārite –
anya-e0804n2:160_1: janesi phussatī mamaṁ. Janayati, sukhaṁ janeti, janayatīti janako, pitā, yo koci
anya-e0804n2:160_2: vā nibbattetā. Puthu kilese janetīti puthujjano. Tattha “janeti janayatī”ti rūpāni
anya-e0804n2:160_3: curādigaṇaṁ patvā suddhakatturūpāni bhavanti. Karotīti hi tesaṁ attho. Hetukattuvasenapi
anya-e0804n2:161_0: Janī pātubhāve. Īkārantoyaṁ akammako dhātu, vipubbo ce, sakammako. Putto jāyati,
anya-e0804n2:161_1: jāto. Puthu kilesā jāyanti etthāti puthujjano. Jananaṁ jāti, “sañjāti, nibbatti,
anya-e0804n2:161_2: abhinibbatti, khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo”ti pariyāyā. Itthī puttaṁ vijāyati, itthī puttaṁ
anya-e0804n2:161_3: vijātā. So puriso vijātamātuyāpi amanāpo. Upavijaññā itthī. Kārite “jāpeti, jāpayati.
anya-e0804n2:162_0: Hana hiṁsāyaṁ. Idha hiṁsāvacanena ghaṭṭanaṁ gahetabbaṁ. Saddo sotamhi haññati. Paṭihaññati.
anya-e0804n2:162_1: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokile sote paṭihaññati. Imāni kattupadāni. Bhūvādigaṇaṁ
anya-e0804n2:162_2: pana patvā “lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṁ, na jātarūpena hananti loha”nti pāḷiyaṁ “haññatī”ti
anya-e0804n2:162_3: padaṁ kammapadaṁ, jātarūpaṁ lohena kammārehi haññatīti attho. “Hanantī”ti padaṁ kattupadaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:162_4: lohaṁ jātarūpena kammārā hanantīti hi attho. Ettha hananaṁ paharaṇanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:163: Rūpa ruppane. Ruppanaṁ kuppanaṁ ghaṭṭanaṁ pīḷanaṁ. Ruppati. Rūpaṁ, ruppanaṁ. Imassa pana “rūpa rūpakriyāya”nti curādigaṇe ṭhitassa “rūpeti rūpayatī”ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:164_0: Tattha rūpanti kenaṭṭhena rūpaṁ? Ruppanaṭṭhena rūpaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā “kiñca
anya-e0804n2:164_1: bhikkhave rūpaṁ? Ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccati. Kena ruppati? Sītenapi
anya-e0804n2:164_2: ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppati, jighacchāyapi ruppati, pipāsāyapi ruppati, ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassenapi
anya-e0804n2:164_3: ruppati, ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā ‘rupa’nti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:165_0: Tattha ruppatīti kuppati ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyati, bhijjatīti attho. Bhijjatīti vikāraṁ
anya-e0804n2:165_1: āpajjati, vikārāpatti ca sītādisannipāte visadisarūpappavattiyeva. Ettha ca kuppatīti
anya-e0804n2:165_2: etena kattuatthe rūpapadasiddhiṁ dasseti, ghaṭṭiyati pīḷiyatīti etehi kammatthe.
anya-e0804n2:165_3: Kopādikriyāyeva hi ruppanakriyāti, so pana kattubhūto kammabhūto ca attho bhijjamāno
anya-e0804n2:165_4: nāma hotīti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṁ “bhijjatīti attho”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:166_0: Atha vā ruppatīti rūpanti kammakattutthe rūpapadasiddhi vuttā. Vikāro hi ruppananti
anya-e0804n2:166_1: vuccati, teneva bhijjatīti atthoti kammakattutthena bhijjatīti saddena atthaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0804n2:166_2: Tattha yadā kammatthe “ruppatī”ti padaṁ, tadā “sītenā”tiādi kattuatthe karaṇavacanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:166_3: Yadā pana “ruppatī”ti padaṁ kattuatthe kammakattuatthe vā, tadā hetumhi karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:167_0: Rūpasaddo khandha bhava nimitta paccaya sarīra vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu atthesu vattati.
anya-e0804n2:167_1: Ayañhi “yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe vattati. “Rūpūpapattiyā
anya-e0804n2:167_2: maggaṁ bhāvetī”ti ettha rūpabhave. “Ajjhattaṁ arūpasaññī bahiddhārūpāni passatī”ti
anya-e0804n2:167_3: ettha kasiṇanimitte. “Sarūpā bhikkhave uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā, no arūpā”ti
anya-e0804n2:167_4: ettha paccaye. “Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre. “Cakkhuñca
anya-e0804n2:167_5: paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe. “Rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno”ti
anya-e0804n2:168: Khandhe bhave nimitte ca, sarīre paccayepi ca;
anya-e0804n2:170: Kupa kope. Kuppati. Kuppanti vātassapi eritassa. Kopo, pakopo. Vacīpakopaṁ rakkheyya.
anya-e0804n2:177_0: Lubha giddhiyaṁ. Lubbhati. Attanoyeva jaṇṇukaṁ olubbha tiṭṭhati. Lubbhanaṁ, lobho,
anya-e0804n2:177_1: lubbhitvā, lubbhitvāna, lubbhiya, lubbhiyāna, olubbhitvā, olubbhitvāna, olubbhiya,
anya-e0804n2:178_0: Tattha lobhoti lubbhanti tena sattā, sayaṁ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti
anya-e0804n2:178_1: lobho. Ettha pana “lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṁ rāgo taṇhā tasiṇā mucchā ejā vanaṁ
anya-e0804n2:179: Khubha sañcalane. Khubbhati, saṁkhubbhati. Khubbhitthanagaraṁ. Saṅkhobho. Kārite – khobheti, khobhayati.
anya-e0804n2:180: Samu upasame. Cittaṁ sammati, upasammati, vūpasammati, samaṇo, santi, santo.
anya-e0804n2:181_0: Ettha samaṇoti sammati santacitto bhavatīti samaṇo. Kāritavasena pana kilese sameti
anya-e0804n2:181_1: upasametīti samaṇoti nibbacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tathā hi “yaṁ sametīti idaṁ ariyaṁ. Samayatītidha
anya-e0804n2:182: Samu khede nirodhe ca. Khedo. Kilamanaṁ. Nirodho abhāvagamanaṁ. Addhānamaggappaṭipannassa kāyo sammati. Aggi sammati. Santo.
anya-e0804n2:183_0: Santasaddo “dīghaṁ santassa yojana”ntiādīsu kilantabhāve āgato. “Ayañca vitakko ayañca
anya-e0804n2:183_1: vicāro santā honti samitā”tiādīsu niruddhabhāve. “Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo gambhīro
anya-e0804n2:183_2: duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto”tiādīsu santañāṇagocaratāyaṁ. “Upasantassa sadā
anya-e0804n2:183_3: satīmato”tiādīsu kilesavūpasame. “Santo have sabbhi pavedayantī”tiādīsu sādhūsu.
anya-e0804n2:183_4: “Pañcime bhikkhave mahācorā santo saṁvijjamānā”tiādīsu atthibhāve. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n2:187: Damu damane. Dammati. Danto, damo, damanaṁ. Kārite “cittaṁ dameti, damayatī”ti rūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:188_0: Tattha damoti indriyasaṁvarādīnaṁ etaṁ nāmaṁ. “Saccena danto damasā upeto. Vedantagū
anya-e0804n2:188_1: vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṁvaro “damo”ti vutto. “Yadi saccā damā cāgā,
anya-e0804n2:188_2: khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā “damo”ti vuttā. “Dānena damena saṁyamena
anya-e0804n2:188_3: saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṁ “damo”ti vuttaṁ. “Damupasamenā”ti ettha khanti
anya-e0804n2:191: Yā gatipāpuṇesu. Yāyati, yāyanti. Pariyāyo. Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage. Yāyanto. Yāyantamanuyāyati. Yātānuyāyī. Yāyituṁ, yāyitvā iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:192_0: Ettha pariyāyasaddassa atthuddhāro vuccate, pariyāyasaddo vāradesanākāraṇesu samantato
anya-e0804n2:192_1: gantabbaṭṭhāne ca sadise ca vattati. “Kassa nu kho ānanda ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo
anya-e0804n2:192_2: ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre vattati. “Madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotinaṁ dhārehī”tiādīsu desanāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:192_3: “Imināpi kho te rājañña pariyāyena evaṁ hotū”tiādīsu kāraṇe. “Pariyāyapatho”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n2:192_4: samantato gantabbaṭṭhāne. “Kopasaddo khobhapariyāyo”tiādīsu sadise vattati. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:196: Vilī vilīnabhāve. Sappi vilīyati. Kārite vilāpayati.
anya-e0804n2:198: Sivu tantasantāne. Sibbati, saṁsibbati. Sibbaṁ, sibbanto. Kārite – sibbeti, sibbayati, sibbāpeti, sibbāpayati.
anya-e0804n2:202: Sā antakammani. Siyati anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasanti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:203: Sā assādane. Rasaṁ sāyati. Sāyitaṁ, sāyanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:204: Si pāṇippasave. Sūyati, pasūyati. Pasūtā gāvī.
anya-e0804n2:207_0: Kilisa upatāpe. Kilissati, saṁkilissati. Kileso, saṁkileso. Ikāralope klissati kleso
anya-e0804n2:207_1: iccādīni. Apica malīnatāpi kilisasaddena vuccati, kiliṭṭhavatthaṁ paridahati. “Cittena
anya-e0804n2:209: Līsa appībhāve. Lissati. Leso. “Lisa lesane”tipi paṭhanti ācariyā.
anya-e0804n2:210: Tasa pipāsāyaṁ. Tassati, paritassati. Paritassanā, tasiṇā, tasito.
anya-e0804n2:211: Dusa dosane. Dussati. Doso, dosanaṁ, dosito.
anya-e0804n2:212: Dusa appītiyaṁ. Dussati, padussati. Doso, padoso, duṭṭho, paduṭṭho, dūsako, dūsito, dūsanā.
anya-e0804n2:213: Asu khepe. Khepo khipanaṁ. Assati. Nirassatiādiyati ca dhammaṁ. Issāso.
anya-e0804n2:214: Ettha ca nirassatīti chaḍḍeti satthāraṁ tathā dhammakkhānādīni. Issāsoti usuṁ assati khipatīti issāso, dhanuggaho.
anya-e0804n2:216_0: Ettha ca yena vinayakammena “nissāya te vatthabba”nti niyassiyati bhajāpiyatīti niyaso
anya-e0804n2:216_1: bālaṁ, taṁ niyasakammaṁ nāma. “Karohi me yakkha niyasakamma”nti ettha pana niggahakammaṁ niyasakammaṁ nāma.
anya-e0804n2:218: Vasa sadde. Sakuṇo vassati. Adhamo migajātānaṁ, siṅgālo tāta vassati. Maṇḍūko vassati.
anya-e0804n2:219: Nasaadassane. Nassanadhammaṁ nassati. Panassati. Vinassati. Nassa vasali, cara pire vinassa. Naṭṭho, vinaṭṭho. Kārite – nāseti, nāsayati.
anya-e0804n2:220_0: Susa sosane. Paṇṇaṁ sussati. Kārite – vāto paṇṇaṁ soseti, sosayati. Kamme – vātena
anya-e0804n2:220_1: paṇṇaṁ sosiyati. Bhāve kriyāpadamappasiddhaṁ. Soso, sukkhaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ. Sussaṁ, sussanto. Sussamāno dahado.
anya-e0804n2:221: Tusa tuṭṭhiyaṁ. Tussati, santussati. Santuṭṭhi, santoso, tosanaṁ, tuṭṭhabbaṁ, tussitabbaṁ, tusitā. Kārite “toseti” iccādīni.
anya-e0804n2:222_0: Hā parihāniyaṁ. Hāyati, parihāyati. Hāyanti tattha vaḷavā. Bhāve “bhayaṁ vā chambhitattaṁ
anya-e0804n2:222_1: vā lomahaṁso vā, so pahīyissatī”ti ca “rāgo pahīyatī”ti ca rūpaṁ. Kamme kriyāpadamappasiddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:222_2: “Rāgo pahīyatī”ti idaṁ pana “hā cāge”ti vuttassa bhūvādigaṇikadhātussa rūpaṁ “rāgaṁ
anya-e0804n2:223: Naha bandhane. Nayhati. Upanayhati. Sannayhati. Sannāho. Sannaddho.
anya-e0804n2:224_0: Muha vecitte. Muyhati, sammuyhati, pamuyhati. Moho, pamoho. Mūḷho. Momūho puriso.
anya-e0804n2:224_1: Momūhaṁ cittaṁ. Kārite – moheti. Pamohako. Ettha ca momūhoti avisadatāya momūho, mahāmūḷhoti attho.
anya-e0804n2:226_0: Nhāsoceyye. Nhāyati, appakkharānaṁ bahubhāve nahāyati. Nahāyitvā, nhāyitvā. Nahānaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:226_1: nhānaṁ. Sīsaṁ nhāto. Ettha ca sīsaṁ nhātoti sīsaṁ dhovitvā nhātoti attho gahetabbo
anya-e0804n2:227: Siniha pītiyaṁ. Siniyhati. Sinehako, sinehito, siniddho. Putte sineho ajāyatha. Ikāralopena sneho. Tathā hi “nisnehamabhikaṅkhāmī”ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0804n2:228: Viriḷa lajjāyaṁ codane ca. Viriḷito. Lajjāvasena attho pasiddho, na codanāvasena. Tathā hi “viriḷitoti lajjito”ti atthasaṁvaṇṇakā garū vadanti “lajjanākārappatto”ti ca.
anya-e0804n2:229: Divādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:233_0: Su savane. “Suṇoti, suṇāti. Suṇiṁsu. Paṭissuṇi, paṭissuṇiṁsu. Assosi, assosuṁ. Paccassosi,
anya-e0804n2:233_1: paccassosuṁ” iccādīni, “suṇissati, sossati” iccādīni ca bhavanti. Abbhāsavisaye “sussūsati,
anya-e0804n2:233_2: sussūsā” iccādīni. Anabbhāsavisaye – sāvako, soto, suṇaṁ, suṇanto, suṇamāno, suyyamāno,
anya-e0804n2:233_3: savanaṁ, sutaṁ. Asuyitthāti vā sutaṁ. Sutavā, sotaṁ, soṇo, suṇituṁ, sotuṁ. Suṇitvā,
anya-e0804n2:233_4: suṇiya, suṇiyāna, sutvā, sutvāna. Kārite – sāveti, sāvayati. Kamme – saddo suyyati,
anya-e0804n2:234_0: Tattha sāvakoti antevāsiko, so duvidho āgatapphalo anāgatapphalo ca, tattha āgatapphalo
anya-e0804n2:234_1: savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātoti “sāvako”ti vuccati, itaro garūnaṁ ovādaṁ suṇātīti
anya-e0804n2:235: Ettha sutasaddassa atthuddhāraṁ vadāma saddhiṁ sotasaddassa atthuddhārena. Sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca anupapadena, sutasaddo ca –
anya-e0804n2:238_0: Tathā hi “senāya pasuto”tiādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n2:238_2: attho. “Ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”tiādīsu anuyuttāti attho. “Tumhehi puññaṁ pasutaṁ anappaka”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n2:238_3: upacitanti attho. “Diṭṭhaṁ sutaṁ mutaṁ viññāta”ntiādīsu saddoti attho. “Bahussuto
anya-e0804n2:242_1: saddaṁ sutvā”tiādīsu sotaviññāṇe. “Dibbāya sotadhātuyā”tiādīsu ñāṇasote. “Yāni sotāni
anya-e0804n2:242_2: lokasminti, yāni etāni sotāni mayā kittitāni pakittitāni ācikkhitāni desitāni paññapitāni
anya-e0804n2:242_3: paṭṭhapitāni vivaritāni vibhattāni uttānīkatāni pakāsitāni. Seyyathidaṁ? Taṇhāsoto
anya-e0804n2:242_4: diṭṭhisoto kilesasoto duccaritasoto avijjāsoto”tiādīsu pañcasu dhammesu. “Addasā
anya-e0804n2:242_5: kho bhagavā mahantaṁ dārukkhandhaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu udakadhārāyaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:242_6: “Ariyassetaṁ āvuso aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa adhivacanaṁ, yadidaṁ soto”tiādīsu ariyamagge.
anya-e0804n2:242_7: “Purisassa ca viññāṇasotaṁ pajānāti ubhayato abbocchinnaṁ idhaloke patiṭṭhitañca
anya-e0804n2:243: Soṇoti sunakho. So hi sāmikassa vacanaṁ suṇātīti soṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:245: Sunakho sārameyyo ca, suṇo sūno ca kukkuro;
anya-e0804n2:246: Soṇo svāno suvāno ca, sāḷuro migadaṁsano.
anya-e0804n2:248: Sunakhī kukkurī sī’ti, ime itthīsu vattare.
anya-e0804n2:251: Kukkuroti ayaṁ tattha, bālakāle ravena ve;
anya-e0804n2:253_0: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā kukkurajātake “ye kukkurā rājakulamhi vaḍḍhā, koleyyakā
anya-e0804n2:253_1: vaṇṇabalūpapannā”tiimasmiṁpadese evamatthaṁ vaṇṇayiṁsu “ye kukkurāti ye sunakhā.
anya-e0804n2:253_2: Yathā hi taruṇopi passāvo pūtimuttanti tadahujātopi siṅgālo “jarasiṅgālo’ti, komalāpi
anya-e0804n2:253_3: gaḷācīlatā ‘pūtilatā’ti, suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo ‘pūtikāyo’ti vuccati, evameva vassasatikopi
anya-e0804n2:253_4: sunakho ‘kukkuro’ti vuccati, tasmā mahallakā kāyūpapannāpi te ‘kukkurā’tveva vuttā”ti.
anya-e0804n2:255: Saka sāmatthiye. Samatthabhāvo sāmatthiyaṁ, yathā dakkhiyaṁ. Sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. Asakkhi. Sakkhissati. Sakko. Sakkī.
anya-e0804n2:256_0: Ettha sakkoti devarājā. So hi parahitaṁ sakahitañca kātuṁ sakkuṇātīti sakko. Apica
anya-e0804n2:256_1: sakyakulajāto yo kocipi. Tathā hi “atha kho mahānāmo sakko”tiādi vuttaṁ. “Bhagavantañca
anya-e0804n2:256_2: piṅgiyo maṁ sakka samuddharāhīti ālapi. Sakyā vata bho kumārā paramasakyā vata bho
anya-e0804n2:256_3: kumārā”ti vacanamupādāya sabbepi sakyakule jātā “sakyā”ti ca “sākiyā”ti ca “sakkā”ti
anya-e0804n2:256_4: ca vuccanti. Ettha svādittepi anekassaradhātuto ekova uṇāpaccayo hoti, na ṇu ṇāpaccayāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:257: Khīkhaye. Khīṇoti. Khīṇāti. Khīṇā jāti. Khīṇo. Ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo.
anya-e0804n2:259: Ci caye. Ṇakārassa nakārattaṁ. Pākāraṁ cinoti. Citaṁ kusalaṁ. Ceto puggalo.
anya-e0804n2:261: Rādha sādha saṁsiddhiyaṁ. Rādhuṇāti. Sādhuṇāti. Rādhanaṁ. Ārādhanaṁ. Sādhanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:262: Pī pītiyaṁ. Pīṇoti, pīṇāti. Pīti, piyo.
anya-e0804n2:263: Apa pāpuṇe sambhu ca. Pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti. Patto. Sabbaññutaṁ satthā patto. Sampatto yamasādhanaṁ. Sambhuṇāti, na kiñci atthaṁ abhisambhuṇāti. Sambhuṇanto, abhisambhuṇamāno.
anya-e0804n2:264_0: Tattha pattoti pasaddo upasaggo “pappotī”ti ettha pasaddo viya. Tathā hi “patto”ti
anya-e0804n2:264_1: ettha pāpuṇīti atthe papubbassa apadhātussa pakāre lutte tapaccayassa dvibhāvo bhavati.
anya-e0804n2:264_2: Tattha na abhisambhuṇātīti na sampāpuṇāti, na sādhetīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0804n2:265: Khipa khepe. Khipuṇāti. Khippaṁ. Khippanti macchapañjaro.
anya-e0804n2:268_0: Ettha ca sabbaguyhesu nimiyati pakkhipiyatīti mitto. “Mitto have sattapadena hotī”ti
anya-e0804n2:268_1: vacanaṁ pana vohāravasena vuttaṁ, na atthavasena. Vucceyya ce, yo koci avissāsiko
anya-e0804n2:268_2: attano paṭiviruddhopi ca mitto nāma bhaveyya, na cevaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Evañca pana daṭṭhabbaṁ
anya-e0804n2:268_4: aññamaññaṁ ālāpasallāpakaraṇamattena mitto nāma hotīti vattabbaṁ. Kiṁkāraṇā? Daḷhavissāso
anya-e0804n2:268_5: mitto nāma na bhaveyyāti mittassa guṇapasaṁsāvasena evaṁ vutta”nti.
anya-e0804n2:269: Vu saṁvaraṇe. Vuṇoti, vuṇāti, saṁvuṇoti, saṁvuṇāti. Paṇḍito sīlasaṁvuto.
anya-e0804n2:270: Su abhisave. Abhisavo nāma pīḷanaṁ manthanaṁ sandhānaṁ sinhānaṁ vā. Suṇoti, suṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:273: Na hi nūnāyaṁ sā khujjā, labhati jivhāya chedanaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:276: Vusa pāgabbiye. Pāgabbiyaṁ nāma kāyavācāmanehi pagabbabhāvo. Vusuṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:279: Ettha pana asamānantattepi samānatthānaṁ samodhānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:280_0: Tika tiga sagha dikkha kivi ciri jiri dāsa du hiṁsāyaṁ. Tikuṇāti. Tiguṇāti. Saghuṇāti.
anya-e0804n2:280_1: Dikkhuṇāti. Kivuṇāti. Ciruṇāti. Jiruṇāti. Dāsuṇāti. Duṇoti, duṇātīti rūpāni hiṁsāvācakāni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:281: Suvādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:285_0: Kī dabbavinimaye. Dabbavinimayo kayavikkayavasena bhaṇḍassa parivattanaṁ. Kiṇāti,
anya-e0804n2:285_1: kiṇanti. Vikkiṇāti, vikkiṇanti. Ketuṁ, kiṇituṁ. Vikketuṁ, vikkiṇituṁ. Kiṇitvā, vikkiṇitvā.
anya-e0804n2:285_2: Kītaṁ bhaṇḍaṁ. Kayo, vikkayo. Vikkiṇeyya haneyya vā.
anya-e0804n2:286: Khi gatiyaṁ. Khiṇāti. Atikhiṇo saro. Khaṁ, khāni. Nakārassa ṇakārattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:287_0: Tattha khiṇātīti gacchati. Atikhinoti atigato. Atrāyaṁ pāḷi “senti cāpātikhiṇāva,
anya-e0804n2:287_1: purāṇāni anutthuna”nti. Tattha cāpātikhiṇā’ti cāpato atikhiṇā atigatā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0804n2:287_2: pana “cāpātikhiṇāti cāpato atikhiṇā cāpā vinimuttāti attho”ti padatthavivaraṇaṁ kataṁ,
anya-e0804n2:287_3: tampi gatatthaññeva sandhāya adhippāyatthavasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Tatra khanti
anya-e0804n2:287_4: saggo. So hi katapuññehi gantabbattā “kha”nti vuccati. Khānīti saggā.
anya-e0804n2:288_0: Ci caye. Puññaṁ cināti. Pākāraṁ cināti. Pāramiyo vicināti, vicinati ca. Pupphaṁ ocināti,
anya-e0804n2:288_1: ocinati vā. Pacināti. Pacinitvā. Citaṁ kusalaṁ. Cayo sañcayo. Cito pākāro. Cinātīti
anya-e0804n2:288_2: ceto, iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī. Yo satto puññasañcayo. “Sañcayo rāsi samūho piṇḍo gaṇo saṅgho
anya-e0804n2:289_0: Ji jaye. Jināti, vijināti, jiniyati. Jetā, jino. Jito māro. Māraṁ jito. Jitavā, jitāvī,
anya-e0804n2:289_1: jitabbo, jeyyo, jayanaṁ, jitaṁ, vijitaṁ, jayo, parājayanaṁ, parājayo. Yassa jitaṁ
anya-e0804n2:289_2: nāvajīyati. Jitamassa noyāti koci loke. Jayo hi buddhassa sirīmato ayaṁ, mārassa
anya-e0804n2:290_0: Tattha jetāti jinātīti jetā, yo koci puggalo. Ajinīti jino, sabbaññū dhammarājā.
anya-e0804n2:290_1: Kiṁ so ajini? Pāpake akusale dhamme mārādiarayo ca. Iti pāpake akusale dhamme mārādayo
anya-e0804n2:290_2: ca arayo ajinīti jino. Vuttampi cetaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:291: “Mādisā ve jinā honti, ye pattā āsavakkhayaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:292: Jitā me pāpakā dhammā, tasmāhaṁ upaka jino”ti,
anya-e0804n2:294_0: Jinasaddo hi kevalo sabbaññumhi pavattati, sopapado pana paccekabuddhādīsu tamhi
anya-e0804n2:294_1: ca yathārahaṁ pavattati. “Paccekajino, odhijino, anodhijino, vipākajino, avipākajino”ti
anya-e0804n2:295: Ji jāniyaṁ. Jināti, na jināti na jāpaye, jino rathassaṁ maṇikuṇḍale ca, putte ca dāre ca tatheva jino. Jino dhanañca dāse ca.
anya-e0804n2:296_0: Ñāavabodhane. Jānāti, ñāyati, nāyati. Animittā na nāyare. Jaññā so yadi hāpaye. Mā
anya-e0804n2:296_1: maṁ jaññūti icchati. “Ime amhāka”nti ñātabbaṭṭhena ñāti, ñātako. Ñātimittā suhajjā
anya-e0804n2:296_2: ca. Ñātako no nisinnoti. Ñātabbaṁ ñeyyaṁ, saṅkhāravikāralakkhaṇanibbānapaññattidhammā.
anya-e0804n2:296_3: Īdisesu ṭhānesu ñeyyasaddo ekantena napuṁsako, vāccaliṅgatte sabbaliṅgiko, yathā?
anya-e0804n2:296_4: Ñeyyo phasso. Ñeyyā vedanā. Ñeyyaṁ cittaṁ. Ñeyyo puriso, ñeyyā itthī, ñeyyaṁ dhananti ca.
anya-e0804n2:297: Thu abhitthave. Thunāti. Abhitthunāti. Thuti, abhitthuti. Thavanā, abhitthavanā, thuto, abhitthuto.
anya-e0804n2:305_0: Ettha mittaddūti mittaṁ dunāti hiṁsati dubbhatīti mittaddu. Atra “vedā na tāṇāya
anya-e0804n2:305_1: bhavanti tassa, mittadduno bhūnahuno narassā”ti pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Dumoti duniyati
anya-e0804n2:305_2: gehasambhārādiatthāya hiṁsiyati chindiyati, paṇṇapupphādiatthikehi vā paṇṇapupphādiharaṇena pīḷiyatīti dumo.
anya-e0804n2:306: Dhū kampane. Dhunāti. Dhūmo, dhonā, dhono, dhuto. Dhunanto vākacīrāni, gacchāmi ambare tadā.
anya-e0804n2:307_0: Tattha dhūmoti dhunāti kampatīti dhūmo. Dhūmasaddo kodhe taṇhāya vitakke pañcasu
anya-e0804n2:307_1: kāmaguṇesu dhammadesanāyaṁ pakatidhūmeti imesu atthesu vattati. “Kodho dhūmo bhasmāni
anya-e0804n2:307_2: mosavajja”nti ettha hi kodhe vattati. “Icchā dhūmāyito sadā”ti ettha taṇhāyaṁ. “Tena
anya-e0804n2:307_3: kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre dhūmāyanto nisinno hotī”ti ettha vitakke.
anya-e0804n2:310: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsito,
anya-e0804n2:312: Ettha pañcasu kāmaguṇesu. “Dhūmaṁ kattā hotī”ti ettha dhammadesanāyaṁ. “Dhajo rathassa paññāno, dhūmo paññānamaggino”ti ettha pakatidhūme. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0804n2:315_0: Dhonāti paññā. Vuttañhetaṁ niddese “dhonā vuccati paññā, yā paññā pajānanā sammādiṭṭhi,
anya-e0804n2:315_1: kiṁkāraṇā dhonāti vuccati paññā? Yaṁ tāya paññāya kāyaduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca
anya-e0804n2:315_2: sandhotañca niddhotañca, vacīduccaritaṁ manoduccaritaṁ dhutañca dhotañca sandhotañca
anya-e0804n2:315_3: niddhotañca. Taṁkāraṇā dhonā vuccati paññā. Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiṁ dhutā
anya-e0804n2:315_4: ca dhotā ca sandhotā ca niddhotā ca, taṁkāraṇā dhonā vuccati paññā”ti. “Dhonassa
anya-e0804n2:315_5: hi natthi kuhiñci loke, pakappitā diṭṭhi bhavābhavesū”ti ayamettha pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:315_6: Atra dhonā assa atthīti dhono, tassa dhonassāti nibbacanaṁ. Dhātūnamanekatthatāya
anya-e0804n2:316_0: Muna ñāṇe. Munāti. Monaṁ, muni. Imasmiṁ ṭhāne dhātuyā ākhyātatte ekantena antalopo
anya-e0804n2:316_1: bhavati. Sobhitattheragāthāyaṁ pana anāgatavacane ukārassa vuddhivasena “ahaṁ monena
anya-e0804n2:316_2: monissa”nti rūpantarañca dissati. Tattha monissanti jānissaṁ. Nāmatte antalopo na
anya-e0804n2:316_3: hoti. Tattha monanti kiñcāpi “na monena muni hotī”ti ettha tuṇhībhāvo “mona”nti vuccati,
anya-e0804n2:316_4: tathāpi idha “ñāṇe”ti vacanato na so adhippeto, ñāṇamevādhippetaṁ, tasmā moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0804n2:316_5: maggañāṇamonampi gahetabbaṁ. Munīti munāti jānāti hitāhitaṁ paricchindatīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:316_6: Atha vā khandhādiloke tulaṁ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā, ime bāhirā”tiādinā
anya-e0804n2:316_7: nayena ime ubho atthe munātīti muni. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0804n2:318: Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
anya-e0804n2:319: Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa muni tena so muni;
anya-e0804n2:320: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
anya-e0804n2:321_0: Aparāpettha bhavati atthavibhāvanā. Munīti monaṁ vuccati ñāṇaṁ, kāyamoneyyādīsu vā
anya-e0804n2:321_1: aññataraṁ, tena samannāgatattā puggalo “munī”ti vuccati. So panesa agāriyamuni anagāriyamuni
anya-e0804n2:321_2: sekkhamuni asekkhamuni paccekamuni munimunīti anekavidho. Tattha agāriyamunīti gihipi
anya-e0804n2:321_3: āgataphalo viññātasāsano. Anagāriyamunīti tathārūpova pabbajito. Sekkhamunīti satta
anya-e0804n2:321_4: sekkhā. Asekkhamunīti khīṇāsavo. Paccekamunīti paccekabuddho. Munimunīti sammāsambuddho.
anya-e0804n2:321_5: Tathā hi āyasmāpi sāriputto āha “munīti vuccati tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho”ti.
anya-e0804n2:322: Pū pavane. Pavanaṁ sodhanaṁ. Punāti. Puññaṁ, putto, dantapoṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:323_0: Ettha ca puññanti attano kārakaṁ punāti sodhetīti puññaṁ. Atha vā yattha sayaṁ uppannaṁ
anya-e0804n2:323_1: taṁsantānaṁ punāti visodhetīti puññaṁ. Kintaṁ? Sucaritaṁ kusalakammaṁ. Sakammikattā
anya-e0804n2:323_2: dhātussa kāritavasena atthavivaraṇaṁ labbhati. Puttoti attano kulaṁ punāti sodhetīti
anya-e0804n2:323_3: putto. Evañca sati hīnajaccānaṁ caṇḍālādīnaṁ putto nāma na bhaveyyāti na vattabbaṁ
anya-e0804n2:323_4: saddānamatthakathanassa nānappakārena pavattito, tasmā attano pitu hadayaṁ pūretīti
anya-e0804n2:323_5: puttoti evamādināpi nibbacanaṁ gahetabbameva. Nānādhātuvasenapi hi padāni siddhiṁ samupagacchanti.
anya-e0804n2:324_0: Putto ca nāma atrajo khetrajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidho. Tattha attānaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0804n2:324_1: jāto atrajo nāma. Sayanapīṭhe pallaṅke ureti evamādīsu nibbatto khetrajo nāma. Santike
anya-e0804n2:324_2: sippuggaṇhanako antevāsiko nāma. Posāpanatthāya dinno dinnako nāma dantapoṇanti dante
anya-e0804n2:325_0: Pī tappanakantīsu. Piṇātīti pīti. Ettha ca pītīti pīṇanaṁ pīti, tappanaṁ kantīti
anya-e0804n2:325_1: ca vuttaṁ hoti. Idaṁ bhāvavasena nibbacanaṁ. Idaṁ pana hetukattuvasena piṇayatīti
anya-e0804n2:326_0: Sā panesā khuddakāpīti khaṇikāpīti okkantikāpīti ubbegāpīti pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā
anya-e0804n2:326_1: hoti. Tattha khuddakāpīti sarīre lomahaṁsanamattameva kātuṁ sakkoti. Khaṇikāpīti
anya-e0804n2:326_2: khaṇe khaṇe vijjuppādasadisā hoti. Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṁ vīci viya kāyaṁ okkamitvā
anya-e0804n2:326_3: okkamitvā bhijjati. Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṁ uddhaggaṁ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā
anya-e0804n2:326_4: hoti. Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṁ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā
anya-e0804n2:326_5: udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anupariphuṭaṁ hoti, evaṁ pañcavidhā pīti,
anya-e0804n2:326_6: sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇattā “piṇātī”ti pītīti suddhakattuvasenapi vattuṁ yujjati. Ettha
anya-e0804n2:326_7: “piyāyati, pitā, piyo, pemo”tiādīni pīdhātuyā eva rūpāni. Tattha “puttaṁ piyāyatīti
anya-e0804n2:326_8: pitā”ti vadanti. Piyāyitabboti piyo. Pemanaṁ pemo.
anya-e0804n2:327: Mā parimāṇe. Mināti. Mānaṁ, parimāṇaṁ, mattaṁ, mattā, mano, vimānaṁ, minitabbaṁ, metabbaṁ, chāyā metabbā. Īdisesu ṭhānesu anīyapaccayo na labbhati.
anya-e0804n2:328_0: Ettha manoti ekāya nāḷiyā ekāya ca tulāya minamāno viya ārammaṇaṁ mināti paricchindatīti
anya-e0804n2:328_1: mano. Visesato miniyate paricchindiyateti vimānaṁ, devānaṁ puññabalena nibbattabyamhaṁ
anya-e0804n2:328_2: devaniketaṁ. Yaṁ vimānaṁ upasobhitaṁ, pabhāsatimidaṁ byamhanti ca ādinā thomiyati.
anya-e0804n2:330_0: Ettha mīnoti maccho. Macchassa hi “mīno maccho ambujo vārijo vāricaro”ti anekāni
anya-e0804n2:330_1: nāmāni. Visesanāmāni pana “amaro khaliso candakulo kandaphali indaphali indavalo
anya-e0804n2:330_2: kuliso vāmi kuṅkutalo kaṇḍiko sakulo maṅguro siṅgī satavaṅko rohito pāṭhīno kāṇo
anya-e0804n2:330_3: savaṅko pāvuso” iccevamādīni, “timi timiṅgalo” iccevamādīni ca bhavanti. Kumīnanti
anya-e0804n2:330_4: kucchitenākārena macche minanti hiṁsanti etenāti kumīnaṁ, macchabandhanapañjaro.
anya-e0804n2:330_5: So pana pāḷiyaṁ kumīnasaddena vuccati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0804n2:335: Ettha munīti attano cittaṁ munāti mavati bandhati rāgadosādivasaṁ gantuṁ na detīti muni.
anya-e0804n2:336: Ri gatidesanesu. Rikāti. Reṇu. Nakārassa ṇattaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:337: Lī silese. Lināti, nilināti. Līnaṁ, sallīnaṁ, paṭisallānaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:338_0: Vī tantasantāne. Vatthaṁ vināti. Iminā suttena cīvaraṁ vināhi. Kamme – idaṁ kho āvuso
anya-e0804n2:338_1: cīvaraṁ maṁ uddissa viyyati. Vītaṁ. Suvītaṁ. Appakaṁ hoti vetabbaṁ. Kārite “vāyāpeti,
anya-e0804n2:338_2: tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpessāmā’ti cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ” iccevamādīni bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:339: Vī hiṁsāyaṁ. Vināti. Veṇu. Veṇūti vaṁso.
anya-e0804n2:340: Lū chedane. Lunāti. Loṇaṁ, kusalaṁ, bālo, lūto.
anya-e0804n2:341_0: Ettha ca loṇanti lunāti vītarasabhāvaṁ vināseti sarasabhāvaṁ karotīti loṇaṁ, lavaṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:341_1: Kuso viya hatthappadesaṁ akusaladhamme lunātīti kusalaṁ, anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇo
anya-e0804n2:341_2: dhammo. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike dve atthe lunātīti bālo, avidvā. Lūtoti makkaṭako
anya-e0804n2:341_3: vuccati. Tassa hi suttaṁ “lūtasutta”nti vadanti. Yūsaṁ pātuṁ paṭaṅgamakkhikādīnaṁ
anya-e0804n2:343_0: Ettha sīmāti sinīyate samaggena saṅghena kammavācāya bandhiyateti sīmā. Sā duvidhā
anya-e0804n2:343_1: baddhasīmā abaddhasīmāti. Tāsu abaddhasīmā mariyādakaraṇavasena “sīmā”ti veditabbā.
anya-e0804n2:343_2: Sināti bandhati kese moḷikaraṇavasena etthāti sīsaṁ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:345: Su hiṁsāyaṁ. Suṇāti. Parasu. Paraṁ suṇanti hiṁsanti etenāti parasu.
anya-e0804n2:347: Ettha asananti āhāro. So hi asiyati bhuñjiyatīti “asana”nti vuccati. “Asnātha khādatha pivathā”ti idamettha nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:349: Ettha ca kilesoti rāgādayopi dukkhampi vuccati.
anya-e0804n2:356: Kiyādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:364: Idāni gahādigaṇo vuccate. Ettheke evaṁ maññanti.
anya-e0804n2:367: Yato ppaṇhā parā heyyuṁ, dhātuto jinasāsane;
anya-e0804n2:368: Tepi aññe na vijjanti, aññatra gahadhātuyā.
anya-e0804n2:370: Pakkhipiṁsu gaṇe evaṁ, na vadiṁsu gahādikaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:371: Na tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ dhīro, gaṇheyya suvicakkhaṇo;
anya-e0804n2:372: Yato kaccāyane vutto, gahādīnaṁ gaṇo visuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:373: “Gahādito ppaṇhā” iti, lakkhaṇaṁ vadatā hi so;
anya-e0804n2:375: Sace visuṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇo nāma na labbhati;
anya-e0804n2:377: “Gahato ppaṇhā” icceva, vattabbaṁ atha vā pana;
anya-e0804n2:379: Yasmā tathā na vuttañca, na katañcekalakkhaṇaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:380: Tasmā ayaṁ visuṁyeva, gaṇo icceva ñāyati.
anya-e0804n2:386: Sappayogaṁ gahādīnaṁ, gaṇaṁ vakkhāmi me suṇa.
anya-e0804n2:387_0: Gaha upādāne. Upādānaṁ gahaṇaṁ, na kilesupādānaṁ. Upasaddo hettha na kiñci atthavisesaṁ
anya-e0804n2:387_1: vadati. Atha vā kāyena cittena vā upagantvā ādānaṁ gahaṇaṁ upādānanti samīpattho
anya-e0804n2:387_2: upasaddo. Katthaci hi upasaddo ādānasaddasahito daḷhaggahaṇe vattati “kāmupādāna”ntiādīsu.
anya-e0804n2:387_3: Idha pana daḷhaggahaṇaṁ vā hotu sithilaggahaṇaṁ vā, yaṁ kiñci gahaṇaṁ upādānameva,
anya-e0804n2:387_4: tasmā gahadhātu gahaṇe vattatīti attho gahetabbo. Gheppati, gaṇhāti vā. Pariggaṇhāti,
anya-e0804n2:387_5: paṭiggaṇhāti, adhigaṇhāti, paggaṇhāti, niggaṇhāti. Padhānagaṇhanako. Gaṇhituṁ, uggaṇhituṁ.
anya-e0804n2:387_6: Gaṇhitvā, uggaṇhitvā. Aññathāpi rūpāni bhavanti. Ahaṁ jāliṁ gahessāmi. Gahetuṁ. Gahetvā.
anya-e0804n2:387_7: Uggāhako, saṅgāhako, ajjhogāḷho. Kārite “gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati, aññataraṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0804n2:387_8: uggaṇhāpenti, saddhiṁ amaccasahassena gaṇhāpetvā. Upajjhaṁ gāhāpetabbo. Upajjhaṁ
anya-e0804n2:387_9: gāhāpetvā. Gāheti, gāhayati, gāhāpessati. Gāhāpayanti sabbhāvaṁ. Gāhako, gāhetvā”
anya-e0804n2:387_10: iccādīni. Kammani – gayhati, saṅgayhati, gaṇhiyati vā. Tathā hi “gaṇhiyanti uggaṇhiyantī”ti
anya-e0804n2:387_11: niddesapāḷi dissati. “Gehaṁ, gāho, pariggaho, saṅgāhako, saṅgahetā” iccādīni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:388_0: Tatra akārānantaratyantapadānaṁ “gheppati, gheppanti. Gheppasī”ti ca “gaṇhati, gaṇhanti.
anya-e0804n2:388_1: Gaṇhasī”ti ca ādinā nayena sabbāsu vibhattīsu sabbathā padamālā yojetabbā. Ākārekārānantaratyantapadānaṁ
anya-e0804n2:388_2: “gaṇhāti gaṇhāpetī”tiādinā yathāsambhavaṁ padamālā yojetabbā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṁ vajjetvā.
anya-e0804n2:389_0: Imāni pana pasiddhāni kānici ajjatanīrūpāni “aggahī mattikāpattaṁ. Aggahuṁ, aggahiṁsu,
anya-e0804n2:389_1: aggahesu”nti. Bhavissantīādīsu gahessati, gahessanti. Sesaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:390_0: Usa dāhe. Dāho uṇhaṁ. Usati dahatīti uṇhaṁ. Uṇhasaddo “uṇhaṁ bhattaṁ bhuñjatī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n2:390_1: dabbamapekkhati, “sītaṁ uṇhaṁ paṭihanatī”tiādīsu pana guṇaṁ uṇhabhāvassa icchitattā.
anya-e0804n2:391: Tasa vipāsāyaṁ. Taṇhā. Kenaṭṭhena taṇhā? Tassati paritassatīti atthena.
anya-e0804n2:392: Jusi pītisevanesu. Juṇho samayo. Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto.
anya-e0804n2:393: Tattha juṇhoti joseti lokassa pītiṁsomanassañca uppādetīti juṇho.
anya-e0804n2:394: Jutadittiyaṁ. Juṇhā ratti. Jotati sayaṁ nippabhāpi samānā candatārakappabhāsenapi dibbati virocati sappabhā hotīti juṇhā.
anya-e0804n2:395: Sā tanukaraṇe. Saṇhavācā. Siyati tanukariyati, na pharusabhāvena kakkasā kariyatīti saṇhā.
anya-e0804n2:396: So antakammani. Saṇhaṁ, ñāṇaṁ. Siyati sayaṁ sukhumabhāvena atisukhumampi atthaṁ antaṁ karoti nipphattiṁ pāpetīti saṇhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:397: Tija nisāne. Nisānaṁ tikkhatā. Tiṇho parasu. Titikkhatīti tiṇho.
anya-e0804n2:398_0: Si sevāyaṁ. Attano hitamāsīsantehi seviyateti sippaṁ, yaṁ kiñci jīvitahetu sikkhitabbaṁ
anya-e0804n2:398_1: sippāyatanaṁ. Apica sippanti aṭṭhārasa mahāsippāni – suti sūramati byākaraṇaṁ chandoviciti
anya-e0804n2:398_2: nirutti jotisatthaṁ sikkhā mokkhañāṇaṁ kriyāvidhi dhanubbedo hatthisikkhā kāmatantaṁ
anya-e0804n2:398_3: assalakkhaṇaṁ purāṇaṁ itihāso nīti takko vejjakañcāti.
anya-e0804n2:399: Ku kucchāyaṁ. Kucchā garahā. Kaṇhā dhammā. Kaṇho puriso.
anya-e0804n2:400_0: Tattha kaṇhāti apabhassarabhāvakaraṇattā paṇḍitehi kucchitabbā garahitabbāti kaṇhā,
anya-e0804n2:400_1: akusaladhammā. Kāḷavaṇṇattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇādikaṁ upanidhāya kucchitabbo ninditabboti
anya-e0804n2:402: Kaṇhe bhūmippadesasmiṁ, na mayhaṁ manaso piyo”ti ca,
anya-e0804n2:411: Ākhyātatte ca nāmatte, ṇhāsaddo usato tathā.
anya-e0804n2:414_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi sāsane “taṇhāyatī”ti kriyāpadampi dissati, tathāpi tassa “pabbatāyati,
anya-e0804n2:414_1: mettāyatī”tiādīni viya nāmasmā vihitassa āyapaccayassa vasena siddhattā kriyāpadattepi
anya-e0804n2:414_2: ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ. “Taṇhāyatī”ti hi idaṁ ṇhāpaccayavatā
anya-e0804n2:414_3: tasadhātuto nipphannataṇhāsaddasmā parassa āyapaccayassa vasena nipphannaṁ. Tathā
anya-e0804n2:414_4: kiñcāpi rūpiyasaṁvohārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyaṁ “vāsiphalaṁ tāpetvā udakaṁ vā khīraṁ
anya-e0804n2:414_5: vā uṇhāpetī”ti imasmiṁ padese “uṇhāpetī”ti hetukattuvācakaṁ kriyāpadaṁ dissati, tathāpi
anya-e0804n2:414_6: tassa ṇhāpaccayavatā usadhātuto nipphannauṇhāsaddato vihitassa kāritasaññassa ṇāpepaccayassa
anya-e0804n2:414_7: vasena nipphannattā kriyāpadattepi ṇhāpaccayo mukhyato labbhatīti na sakkā vattuṁ.
anya-e0804n2:414_8: “Uṇhāpetī”ti idaṁ vuttappakārauṇhāsaddato ṇāpepaccayavasena nipphannaṁ, etasmiṁ diṭṭhe
anya-e0804n2:415_1: kattupadampi nayato diṭṭhameva hoti kattukāritapadānaṁ ekadhātumhi upalabbhamānattā,
anya-e0804n2:415_2: yathā? Gaṇhati, gaṇhāpeti, gacchati, gacchāpetīti, tasmā “usa dāhe”ti dhātussa “uṇhatī”ti
anya-e0804n2:415_3: rūpaṁ upalabbhatīti mantvā “uṇhatīti uṇha”nti nibbacanaṁ kātabbaṁ. Iti ppapaccayo
anya-e0804n2:415_4: gahato ca aññato ca ekadhā labbhati, ṇhāpaccayo pana gahato usato ca dvidhā aññato
anya-e0804n2:415_5: ekadhā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Kiñcāpettha evaṁ niyamo vutto, tathāpi sāṭṭhakathe
anya-e0804n2:415_6: tepiṭake buddhavacane aññānipi ekekassa dhātussa nāmikapadāni dve dve kriyāpadāni
anya-e0804n2:415_7: vicinitabbāni. Yena pana buddhavacanānurūpena nayena gahādigaṇe ādisaddena tasadhātādayo
anya-e0804n2:415_8: amhehi gahitā, imasmā nayā añño nayo pasatthataro natthi, ayameva pasatthataro, tasmā
anya-e0804n2:415_9: ayaṁ nīti sāsanaṭṭhitiyā āyasmantehi sādhukaṁ dhāretabbā vācetabbā ca.
anya-e0804n2:416: Gahādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:420_0: Tanu vitthāre. Tanoti. Āyatanaṁ, tanu. Kammani “taniyyati, taniyyanti. Vitaniyyatī”ti
anya-e0804n2:420_1: rūpāni. Atrāyaṁ pāḷi “yathā hi āsabhaṁ cammaṁ, pathabyā vitaniyyatī”ti. Garū pana
anya-e0804n2:420_2: “patāyate, pataññatī”ti rūpāni vadanti. Tanituṁ, tanitvāna. Tumantādirūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:421_0: Tattha āyatananti āyabhūte dhamme tanoti vitthāretīti āyatanaṁ. Tanūti sarīraṁ. Tañhi
anya-e0804n2:421_1: kalalato paṭṭhāya kammādīhi yathāsambhavaṁ taniyyati vitthāriyati mahattaṁ pāpiyatīti
anya-e0804n2:421_2: “tanū”ti vuccati. “Tanu vapu sarīraṁ puṁ kāyo deho”tiādayo sarīravācakā saddā. Sarīraṁ
anya-e0804n2:421_3: khandhapañcakaṁ. Yañhi mahājano sarīranti vadati, taṁ paramatthato khandhapañcakamattameva,
anya-e0804n2:421_4: na tato attā vā attaniyaṁ vā upalabbhati. “Kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanuttakaraṁ sakadāgāmimaggacitta”ntiādīsu
anya-e0804n2:421_5: pana tanusaddo appatthavācako, appatthavācakassa ca tassa kriyāpadaṁ na passāma,
anya-e0804n2:421_6: tasmā nipātapadena tena bhavitabbaṁ. Tanusaddo nipātapadanti vuttaṭṭhānampi na passāma,
anya-e0804n2:422: Tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma. Tanute, tanunte. Tanuse, tanuse, tanuvhe. Tane, tanumhe. Sesaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:423_0: Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, tane, taneyyuṁ. Vitana, vitanu. Atanā, atanu. Ammāya patanu
anya-e0804n2:423_1: kesā. Atani, ataniṁsu. Tanissati, tanissanti. Atanissā, atanissaṁsu. Kammani “taniyyati,
anya-e0804n2:424: Saka sattiyaṁ. Satti samatthabhāvo. Sakkoti sakko. Viññāpetuṁ asakkhi. Sakkhissasi. Sakkhati. Tvampi amma pabbajituṁ sakkhissasi. Sakkate jarāya paṭikammaṁ kātunti pāḷi.
anya-e0804n2:425_0: Tattha sakkoti devarājā. So hi atthānaṁ sahassampi muhuttena cintanasamatthatāya
anya-e0804n2:425_1: saparahitaṁ kātuṁ sakkotīti “sakko”ti vuccati. Aññatra pana dhātūnaṁ avisaye taddhitavasena
anya-e0804n2:425_2: sakkaccaṁ dānaṁ adāsīti sakkoti evampi atthaṁ gahetvā sakkasaddo niruttinayena sādhetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:425_3: Vuttañhi bhagavatā “sakko mahāli devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṁ
anya-e0804n2:425_4: dānaṁ adāsi, tasmā ‘sakko’ti vuccatī”ti. Sakkonto. Sakkontī. Sakkontaṁ kulaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:428: Tiṇu adane. Tiṇoti. Tiṇaṁ. Ettha tiṇanti yavasaṁ. Tañhi tiṇiyate tiṇabhakkhehi goṇādīhi adiyate khādiyateti tiṇaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:430: Hanu apanayane. Apanayanaṁ anālāpakaraṇaṁ nibbacanatākaraṇaṁ. Hanoti. Hanute.
anya-e0804n2:432: Manu bodhane. Manoti. Manute. Mano. Manaṁ. Mānasaṁ. Manusso. Mānavo. Māṇavo.
anya-e0804n2:433_0: Ettha manoti manute bujjhatīti mano, evaṁ manaṁ. Imesaṁ pana dvinnaṁ manasaddānaṁ
anya-e0804n2:433_1: “yasmiṁ mano nivisati. Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hotī”tiādīsu punnapuṁsakaliṅgatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0804n2:433_2: Mānasanti rāgopi cittampi arahattampi. “Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṁ carati mānaso”ti
anya-e0804n2:433_3: ettha hi rāgo mānasaṁ. “Cittaṁ mano mānasa”nti ettha cittaṁ. “Appattamānaso sekkho,
anya-e0804n2:433_4: kālaṁ kayirā jane suto”ti ettha arahattaṁ. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0804n2:436_0: Tattha sampayuttamanasi bhavoti rāgo mānaso. Mano eva mānasanti katvā cittaṁ mānasaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:436_1: Anavasesato mānaṁ siyati samucchindatīti aggamaggo mānasaṁ. Tannibbattattā pana arahattassa
anya-e0804n2:436_2: mānasatā daṭṭhabbā. Manūti satto. “Yena cakkhupasādena, rūpāni manu passatī”ti ettha
anya-e0804n2:436_3: hi “manū”ti satto vutto. Atha vā manūti paṭhamakappikakāle manussānaṁ mātāpibhuṭṭhāne
anya-e0804n2:436_4: ṭhito manunāmako puriso, yo sāsane “mahāsammatarājā”ti vutto. So hi sakalalokassa
anya-e0804n2:436_5: hitaṁ kātuṁ manute jānātīti “manū”ti vuccati. Yathābalaṁ attano hitaṁ manute jānātīti
anya-e0804n2:436_6: manusso, manassa vā ussannattā manusso. Atha vā vuttappakārassa manuno apaccaṁ manusso.
anya-e0804n2:436_7: Evaṁ mānavo māṇavo ca, nakārassa hi ṇakāre kate “māṇavo”ti rūpaṁ sijjhati. Keci panāhu
anya-e0804n2:436_9: pana māṇavasaddo kucchitamūḷhāpaccavacano”ti, taṁ vīmaṁsitvā yuttañce, gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:436_10: na panettha vattabbaṁ “māṇavasaddassa atthuddhāravacane idaṁ vacanaṁ virujjhatī”ti
anya-e0804n2:437_1: imasmiṁ padese aṭṭhakathācariyehi “subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi pāsādiko, tenassa
anya-e0804n2:437_2: aṅgasubhatāya ‘subho’tveva nāmaṁ akaṁsu. ‘Māṇavo’ti pana taṁ taruṇakāle vohariṁsu,
anya-e0804n2:437_3: so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena vohariyatī”ti evaṁ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa
anya-e0804n2:437_4: attho pakāsito, taṭṭīkāyampi garūhi “yaṁ apaccaṁ kucchitaṁ muddhaṁ vā, tattha loke
anya-e0804n2:437_5: māṇavavohāro, yebhuyyena ca sattā daharakāle muddhadhātukā hontīti vuttaṁ ‘taruṇakāle
anya-e0804n2:437_6: vohariṁsū”ti, evaṁ muddhajaṇakārassa māṇavasaddassa attho pakāsito. Idāni māṇavasaddassa
anya-e0804n2:437_7: atthuddhāro bhavati, māṇavoti sattopi coropi taruṇopi vuccati. “Coditā devadūtehi,
anya-e0804n2:437_8: ye pamajjanti māṇavā”tiādīsu hi satto “māṇavo”ti vutto. “Māṇavehi saha gacchanti
anya-e0804n2:437_9: katakammehipi akatakammehipī”tiādīsu coro. “Ambaṭṭho māṇavo”tiādīsu taruṇo “māṇavo”ti vutto.
anya-e0804n2:439: Ettha āpoti appoti taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ vissaratīti āpo.
anya-e0804n2:440: Mā parimāṇe. Minoti. Upamā, upamānaṁ, vimānaṁ. Aññānipi yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:441_0: Ettha ca yā accantaṁ na minoti na vicchindati, sā mānassa samīpe vattatīti upamā
anya-e0804n2:441_1: yathā “goṇo viya gavajo”ti. Upamānanti upamā eva. Tathā hi “vītopamānamappamāṇamanāthanātha”nti.
anya-e0804n2:441_2: Ettha vītopamānanti imassa vītopamaṁ, nirupamanti attho. Atha vā upamānanti upametabbākāro
anya-e0804n2:441_3: “sīho viya bhagavā”ti. Ettha hi sīho upamā, bhagavā upameyyo tejoparakkamādīhi upametabbattā,
anya-e0804n2:441_4: tejoparakkamādayo upametabbākāro. Ettha pana sātisayattā kiñcāpi sīhassa tejādīhi
anya-e0804n2:441_5: bhagavato tejādiupametabbākāro natthi, tathāpi hīnūpamāvasena “sīho viya bhagavā”ti
anya-e0804n2:441_6: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Vimānanti utusamuṭṭhānattepi kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānattā kammena
anya-e0804n2:442_0: Kara karaṇe. “Karoti, kayirati, kubbati, krubbati, pakaroti, upakaroti, apakaroti,
anya-e0804n2:442_1: paṭikaroti, nirākaroti, paṭisaṅkharoti, abhisaṅkharoti” iccevamādīni kattari bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:442_2: Kamme pāḷinayavasena ikārāgamaṭṭhāne yakārassa dvebhāvo. Tasmiṁyevaṭhāne rayakārānaṁ
anya-e0804n2:442_3: vipariyāye sati na dvebhāvo. Tathā īkārāgamaṭṭhāne “kariyyati, kayirati, karīyati,
anya-e0804n2:442_4: kayyati, pakarīyati, pakariyyati, paṭisaṅkhariyyati, abhisaṅkhariyyati” iccevamādīni kammani bhavanti.
anya-e0804n2:443_0: Ettha ca kayiratīti padaṁ dvīsu ṭhānesu dissati kattari kamme ca. Tesa kattuvasena
anya-e0804n2:443_1: “puriso kammaṁ kayiratī”ti yojetabbaṁ, kammavasena pana ayaṁ pāḷi “kuṭi me kayirati
anya-e0804n2:443_2: adesitavatthukā”ti. Tattha ca kattuvasena vuttaṁ kattupadaṁ yirapaccayena siddhaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:443_3: Kammavasena pana vuttaṁ kammapadaṁ ikārāgamassa ādiantabhūtānaṁ rayakārānaṁ vipariyāyenāti
anya-e0804n2:443_4: daṭṭhabbaṁ. “Kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayatī”ti cattāri kāritarūpāni, yāni
anya-e0804n2:444_0: Idāni pana padamālā vattabbā, tatra paṭhamaṁ “kubbatī”ti padasseva padamālaṁ yojessāma
anya-e0804n2:444_1: sabbāsu vibhattīsu ekākārena yojetabbattā. “Karotī”ti okārānantaratyantapadassa pana
anya-e0804n2:444_2: “kāretī”ti ekārānantaratyantapadassa ca padamālaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ pacchā yojessāma
anya-e0804n2:445: Tatra kubbati, kubbanti. Kubbasi, kubbatha. Kubbāmi, kubbāma. Kubbate, kubbante. Kubbase, kubbavhe. Kubbe, kubbamhe. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:446: Pañcamiyādīnaṁ vasena pana kubbatu, kubbantu. Kubbeyya, kubbeyyuṁ. Sesaṁ “bhavati, bhavantī”ti vuttanayānusārena sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:447_0: “Kariyatī”tiādīnipi a kārānantaratyantapadāni evameva yojetabbāni. Ettha ca “kubbati,
anya-e0804n2:447_1: kubbanti. Kubbasī”tiādinā vuttā ayaṁ padamālā pāḷinayadassanato edisī vuttā. Saddasatthavidū
anya-e0804n2:447_2: pana sāsanikā saddasattheyeva ādaraṁ katvā “kubbati, kubbasī”ti evaṁpakārāni rūpāni
anya-e0804n2:447_3: pāḷiyaṁ natthīti maññantā na icchanti. Tehi saddasatthe viya pāḷiyampi “asanto nānukubbantī”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n2:447_4: okārapaccayassādesabhūto ukāro sareyeva pare vakāraṁ pappotīti maññamānā “kubbanti,
anya-e0804n2:447_6: pāḷiyaṁ natthīti na icchanti. Mayaṁ pana pāḷinayadassanato tāni rūpāni icchāma. Atra
anya-e0804n2:447_7: sotārānaṁ kaṅkhāvinodanatthaṁ kiñci pāḷinayaṁ vadāma – “sīlavanto na kubbanti, bālo
anya-e0804n2:447_8: sīlāni kubbatī”ti ca, “kasmā bhavaṁ vijanamaraññanissito, tapo idha krubbatī”ti ca,
anya-e0804n2:447_9: “pharusāhi vācāhi pakrubbamāno”ti ca. Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu akārāgamo kātabbo. Acinteyyo
anya-e0804n2:447_10: hi pāḷinayo, yebhuyyena saddasatthanayavidūro ca. Tathā hi yathā “agginiṁ sampajjalitaṁ
anya-e0804n2:447_11: pavisantī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “aggini, agginī, agginayo. Agginiṁ, agginī, agginayo.
anya-e0804n2:447_12: Aggininā”ti padamālā kātabbā hoti, evameva “bālo sīlāni kubbatī”ti pāḷigatidassanato
anya-e0804n2:448_0: Yathā ca “bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātavedā”ti pāḷigatidassanato “santo sabbhīhi saddhiṁ
anya-e0804n2:448_1: sataṁ dhammo na jaraṁ upetīti pavedayantī”ti aṭṭhakathāgatidassanato ca “sabbhi,
anya-e0804n2:448_2: sabbhī, sabbhayo. Sabbhiṁ, sabbhī, sabbhayo. Sabbhinā”ti padamālā yojetabbā hoti,
anya-e0804n2:448_3: evameva “bālo sīlāni kubbatī”ti pāḷigatidassanato “kubbati, kubbanti. Kubbasī”ti
anya-e0804n2:448_4: padamālāpi yojetabbāva. Tathā “krubbati, krubbanti. Krubbasī”tiādi sabbaṁ sabbattha yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:449_0: Idāni yathāpaṭiññātā padamālā anuppattā. Karoti, karonti. Karosi, karotha. Karomi,
anya-e0804n2:449_1: kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kare, karumhe. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:450: Karotu, kurutu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, kummi, karoma, kumma. Kurutaṁ, kubbantaṁ. Karassu, kurussu, kuruvho. Kare, kubbāmase. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:453: Taṁ vivāhaṁ asaṁyuttaṁ, kathaṁ amhe karomase”ti
anya-e0804n2:454_0: Pāḷidassanato “karomase”ti padaṁ kasmā idha na vuttaṁ, nanu karadhātuto paraṁ okāraṁ
anya-e0804n2:454_1: paṭicca āmasevacanassāvayavabhūto ākāro lopaṁ pappotīti? Tanna, “karomase”ti ettha
anya-e0804n2:454_2: “āmase”ti vacanassa abhāvato mavacanassa sabbhāvato. Ettha hi sekāro āgamo, tasmā
anya-e0804n2:454_3: “karomā”ti vattamānāvacanavasena attho gahetabbo, na pana pañcamīvacanavasena. Evaṁbhūto
anya-e0804n2:454_4: ca sekāro katthaci nāmikapadato paro hoti “ye keci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse. Yaṁ balaṁ
anya-e0804n2:456: Sutaṁ netaṁ abhiṇhaso, tasmā evaṁ vademase”ti
anya-e0804n2:458: Kareyya, kareyyuṁ. Kareyyāsi, kareyyātha. Kareyyāmi, kareyyāma. Kubbetha, kubberaṁ. Kubbetho, kubbeyyavho. Kareyyaṁ, kare, kareyyāmhe. Sattamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:459: Kara, karu. Kare, karittha. Karaṁ, karimha. Karittha, karire. Karittho, karivho. Kariṁ, karimhe. Parokkhāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:460_0: Ettha karāti puriso kammaṁ karīti paṭhamapurisayojanāya yojetabbaṁ. “Āguṁ kara mahārāja,
anya-e0804n2:460_1: akaraṁ kammadukkaṭa”nti etthāpi “mahārāja bhavaṁ āguṁ karī”ti paṭhamapurisayojanāya
anya-e0804n2:460_2: yojetabbaṁ. Evañhi sati ayaṁ payogo “maññe bhavaṁ patthayati, rañño bhariyaṁ patibbata”ntiādayo
anya-e0804n2:461_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana majjhimapurisappayogo vutto “āguṁ karāti mahārāja tvaṁ mahāparādhaṁ
anya-e0804n2:461_1: mahāpāpaṁ kari. Dukkaṭanti yaṁ kataṁ dukkaṭaṁ hoti,taṁ lāmakaṁ kammaṁ akara”nti,
anya-e0804n2:461_2: tasmā jātakaṭṭhakathāvasenāpi kadāci karaiti ca karīti ca akaranti ca majjhimapurisappayogo
anya-e0804n2:461_3: bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Yebhuyyavasena pana “puriso kammaṁ kara, puriso kammaṁ kari,
anya-e0804n2:461_4: ahaṁ kammaṁ akara”nti paṭhamuttamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo. Ettha ca karaiti yathāvuttavibhattivasena,
anya-e0804n2:461_5: karīti ajjatanīvasena, akaranti hiyyattanīvasena vuttaṁ. Tattha “karittho”ti padaṁ
anya-e0804n2:461_6: “aññaṁ bhattāraṁ pariyesa, mā kisittho mayā vinā”ti ettha “kisittho”ti padena samaṁ
anya-e0804n2:461_7: parokkhāyattanopadamajjhimapurisekavacanavasena, ediso pana nayo aññatrāpi yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbo.
anya-e0804n2:462_0: Akā, akarā, akara iti rassapāṭhopi. Akaru. Ettha “sabbārivijayaṁ akā”ti padaṁ nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0804n2:462_1: Akarāti puriso kammaṁ akāsīti atītakriyāvācako paṭhamapurisappayogo daṭṭhabbo. Tathā
anya-e0804n2:462_2: hi “rajjassa kira so bhīto, akarā ālaye bahū”ti pāḷi dissati. “Mā metaṁ akarā kammaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:462_3: mā me udakamāharī”ti ettha pana santepi atītavācakapaṭṭhamapurisappayogabhāve māsaddayogato
anya-e0804n2:462_4: hiyyattanajjatanīvibhattiyo pañcamīvibhattiatthe anuttakālikā hutvā “tvaṁ mā karosi,
anya-e0804n2:463_0: Kiñca bhiyyo “jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti alabbhaneyyaṁ ṭhāna”ntiādīsupi santepi atītavācakapaṭhamapurisappayogabhāve
anya-e0804n2:463_2: paṭhamapurisappayogārahā bhavanti. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā “jarādhammaṁ mā jīrīti
anya-e0804n2:463_3: yaṁ mayhaṁ jarāsabhāvaṁ, taṁ mā jīritu. Esa nayo sesesupī”ti. Yaṁ panamhehi “akara
anya-e0804n2:463_4: iti rassapāṭhopī”ti vuttaṁ, tassa “atikara’makarā’cariya, mayhampetaṁ na ruccatī”ti
anya-e0804n2:463_5: imāya pāḷiyā vasena atthitā veditabbā. Tassāyamattho “ācariya bhavaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0804n2:463_6: akarā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena gahetabbo. Apica “bhava”nti vattabbe atthe “tva”nti
anya-e0804n2:463_7: vacanaṁ vattabbamevāti adhippāyavasena “ācariya tvaṁ atikkantakaraṇaṁ karosī”ti yojanāpi kātabbāva.
anya-e0804n2:464_0: Akaro, akattha, akarotha. Akaraṁ, akaṁ, akaramha, akamha. Ettha “saṁvaḍḍhayitvā puḷinaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:464_1: akaṁ puḷinacetiya”nti pāḷi nidassanaṁ. Akattha, akatthuṁ. Akuruse, akaravhaṁ. Akariṁ,
anya-e0804n2:465_0: Ettha ca pañcavidho sekāro āharitvā dassetabbo. Tathā hi pañcavidho sekāro padāvayava
anya-e0804n2:465_1: apadāvayavaanekantapadāvayava sosaddattha ādesavasena. Tattha padāvayavo sekāro “tvaṁ
anya-e0804n2:465_2: kammaṁ kuruse, tvaṁ atthakusalo abhavase”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbo. Apadāvayavo pana “tasmā
anya-e0804n2:465_3: evaṁ vademase. Mūlā akusalā samūhatāse”tiādīsu daṭṭhabbo. Anekantapadāvayavo “arogā
anya-e0804n2:465_4: ca bhavāmase. Maṇiṁ tāta gaṇhāmase”ādīsu daṭṭhabbo. Ettha hi sekāro yadi pañcamīvibhattiyaṁ
anya-e0804n2:465_6: gaṇhāmase”ti padānaṁ avayavo hoti. Yadi pana āgamo, pañcamīvibhattiyuttānaṁ patthanāsīsanatthānaṁ
anya-e0804n2:465_7: “bhavāma, gaṇhāmā”ti padānaṁ avayavo na hoti, evaṁ “bhavāmase”tiādīsu sekārassa anekantapadāvayavattaṁ
anya-e0804n2:465_8: veditabbaṁ. Sosaddattho “esese eke ekaṭṭhe”ti ettha daṭṭhabbo. Eseseti imassa hi
anya-e0804n2:465_9: “esoso eko ekaṭṭho”ti attho. Ādeso “akaramhasa te kicca”nti ettha, “okkantāmasi bhūtānī”ti
anya-e0804n2:465_10: cettha daṭṭhabbo ekārassa akārikārādesakaraṇavasena. Tattha “akaramhasa te kicca”nti
anya-e0804n2:465_11: imassa “akaramhase te kicca”nti attho. “Akaramhase”ti cettha sace sekāro āgamo, tadā
anya-e0804n2:465_12: “karamhā”ti padaṁ hiyyattanīparassapade uttamapurisabahuvacanantaṁ. Sace pana mhasevacanassāvayavo,
anya-e0804n2:465_13: tadā “akaramhase”ti padaṁ hiyyattanīattanopade uttamapurisabahuvacanantaṁ. Evaṁ pañcavidho
anya-e0804n2:466: Akari, kari, akāsi, akaruṁ, akariṁsu, akaṁsu, akaṁsuṁ. Akaro, akarittha, akāsittha.
anya-e0804n2:467_0: Ettha ca akaroti tvaṁ akaroti yojetabbaṁ. “Akaro” iti hi padaṁ “varañce me ado sakkā”ti
anya-e0804n2:467_1: ettha majjhimapurisekavacanatthaṁ “ado”ti padamiva daṭṭhabbaṁ pāḷiyaṁ avijjamānattepi
anya-e0804n2:467_2: nayavasena gahetabbattā. Garū pana “akaro”ti vuttaṭṭhāne “akāsī”ti majjhimapurisavacanaṁ
anya-e0804n2:467_3: icchanti. Tādisañhi padaṁ yebhuyyena paṭhamapurisavacanameva hoti. Tathā hi “adāsi
anya-e0804n2:467_4: me, akāsi me”ti paṭhamapurisapāḷiyo bahū sandissanti. “Mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṁ, mā kho
anya-e0804n2:467_5: sūkaramukho ahū”tiādīsu pana māsaddayogato “tvaṁ pāpaṁ mā akāsi, mā sūkaramukho ahosī”ti
anya-e0804n2:468: Akariṁ, kariṁ, akāsiṁ, akarimha, karimha, akāsimha. Akarā, akarū. Akaruse, akarivhaṁ. Akaraṁ, akarimhe. Ajjatanīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:469_0: Karissati, karissanti. Karissasi, karissatha. Karissāmi, karissāma. Karissate, karissante.
anya-e0804n2:469_1: Karissase, karissavhe. Karissaṁ, kassaṁ iccapi. Tathā hi pāḷi dissati “kassaṁ purisakāriya”nti.
anya-e0804n2:469_2: Karissamhe. Tathā kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma. Kāhiti, kāhinti.
anya-e0804n2:469_3: Kāhisi iccevamādinā yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Bhavissantīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:470: Akarissā, akarissa, akarissaṁsūti sesaṁ sabbaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Kālātipattivasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:471: Kayirati, kayiranti. Kayirasi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Kayirate. Sesaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Vattamānāvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:472: Kayiratu, kayirantu. Sesaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Pañcamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:473_0: Kayirā, kuyirā. Kayiruṁ. Atrāyaṁ pāḷi “kumbhimhipa’ñjaliṁ kuyirā, cātañcāpi padakkhiṇa”nti.
anya-e0804n2:473_1: Tattha kumbhimhipi añjalinti chedo. Kayirāsi, kayirātha. Kayirāmi, kayirāma. Kayiretha,
anya-e0804n2:473_2: kayireraṁ. Kayiretho, kayirāvho. Kayiraṁ, kayirāmhe. Sattamīvasena vuttarūpāni.
anya-e0804n2:474_0: Tattha kayirāti idaṁ “puññañce puriso kayirā”ti dassanato paṭhamapurisavasena yojetabbaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:474_1: “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti etthāpi “sārathi bhavaṁ adhammaṁ kareyyā”ti paṭhamapurisavasena
anya-e0804n2:474_2: yojetabbaṁ, na majjhimapurisavasena. Atha vā “kayirāsī”ti vattabbe sikāralopaṁ katvā
anya-e0804n2:475_0: Ettha pana siyā – yathā “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti pāḷiyaṁ “labhethā”ti imassa padassa
anya-e0804n2:475_2: paṭhamapurisavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā purisavipallāsaṁ katvā “labheyya”nti uttamapurisavasenattho
anya-e0804n2:475_3: aṭṭhakathācariyehi gahito, tathā tumhehipi “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha “kayirā”ti
anya-e0804n2:475_4: padassa purisavipallāsaṁ katvā “kareyyāsī”ti majjhimapurisavasenattho vattabbo, aṭṭhakathācariyehipi
anya-e0804n2:475_5: “kareyyāsī”ti tadattho vuttoti? Saccaṁ, evaṁ santepi aṭṭhakathācariyehi vohāratthesu
anya-e0804n2:475_7: vattabbe atthe tvaṁsaddo pavattatīti cintetvā adhippāyatthavasena “kareyyāsī”ti attho
anya-e0804n2:475_8: vutto, na purisavipallāsavasena. Tathā hi “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti imassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ
anya-e0804n2:475_10: sārathi kayirā”ti imassa pana aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “kayirā”ti ulliṅgitvā “kareyyāsī”ti vivaraṇaṁ
anya-e0804n2:475_11: kataṁ, tasmā “adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā”ti ettha purisavipallāso na cintetabbo. Atha
anya-e0804n2:475_12: vā yathā “puttaṁ labhetha varada”nti ettha ca “kāye rajo na limpethā”tiādīsu ethavacanaṁ
anya-e0804n2:475_13: gahitaṁ, evaṁ ethavacanaṁ aggahetvā “labhe athā”ti padacchedo karaṇīyo. Evañhi sati
anya-e0804n2:475_14: purisavipallāsena kiccaṁ natthi. Tattha labheti sattamiyā uttamapurisavacanaṁ “vajjhañcāpi
anya-e0804n2:475_15: pamocaye”ti padamiva. Athāti adhikārantare nipāto padapūraṇe vā. Ettha ca adhikārantaravasena
anya-e0804n2:475_16: aparampi varaṁ puttaṁ labheyyanti attho. Yasmā panettha dvinnamatthānaṁ uppatti dissati,
anya-e0804n2:475_17: yasmā cetesu dvīsu dujjāno bhagavato adhippāyo, tasmā dvepi atthā gahetabbāva.
anya-e0804n2:476_0: Ettha pana kiñcāpi liṅgavipallāso vibhattivipallāso vacanavipallāso kālavipallāso
anya-e0804n2:476_1: purisavipallāso akkharavipallāsoti chabbidho vipallāso āharitvā dassetabbo, tathāpi
anya-e0804n2:476_2: so upari āvibhavissatīti na dassito. Tatra kayirāthāti padaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena
anya-e0804n2:476_3: attanopadavasena ca dvidhā bhijjati, tathā majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena
anya-e0804n2:476_4: ca. Tathā hi “yathā puññāni kayirātha, dadantā aparāpara”nti ettha “kayirāthā”ti
anya-e0804n2:476_5: idaṁ sattamiyā parassapadavasena majjhimapurisabahuvacanavasena ca vuttaṁ. Yathānurūpaṁ
anya-e0804n2:476_6: puññāni kareyyāthayevāti hi attho. “Kayirātha dhīro puññānī”ti ettha pana “kayirāthā”ti
anya-e0804n2:476_7: idaṁ sattamiyā attanopadavasena paṭhamapurisekavacanavasena ca vuttaṁ. Kareyyāti
anya-e0804n2:476_8: hi attho. Idha parokkhādivasena yirapaccayasahitāni rūpāni yebhuyyena sāsane appasiddhānīti na dassitāni.
anya-e0804n2:477_0: Attano phalaṁ karotīti kāraṇaṁ. Karotīti kattā, evaṁ kārako kārakaṁ vā. Ettha hi
anya-e0804n2:477_1: kārakasaddo yattha kattukārakakammakārakādivācako, tattha pulliṅgopi hoti, yebhuyyena
anya-e0804n2:477_2: napuṁsakaliṅgopi. Yattha pana rajatakārakammakāralohakārādivācako, tattha pulliṅgo
anya-e0804n2:477_3: eva. Kārāpetīti kārāpako. Karaṁ, kubbaṁ, krubbaṁ, karonto, kubbanto, kubbāno, kurumāno,
anya-e0804n2:477_4: pakruṁbbamāno. Kārikā, kārāpikā. Karontī, kubbantī. Kārakaṁ kulaṁ. Kārāpakaṁ, karontaṁ,
anya-e0804n2:477_5: kubbantaṁ, kurumānaṁ. Saṅkhāro, parikkhāro, parikkhato, purakkhato, karaṇaṁ, kriyā.
anya-e0804n2:477_6: Akkharacintakā pana “kriyā” iccapi padamicchanti. Ettha kriyāsaddo kiñcāpi “aphalā
anya-e0804n2:477_7: hoti akrubbato”tiādīsu kakārarakārasaṁyogavantāni padāni dissanti, tathāpi klesasaddo
anya-e0804n2:477_8: viya pāḷiyaṁ na dissati, adissamānopi so aṭṭhakathācariyādīhi garūhi gahitattā gahetabbova.
anya-e0804n2:478: Kātuṁ, kattuṁ. Kātave, kāretuṁ. Katvā, katvāna, kātuna, karitvā, karitvāna, kacca, adhikacca, kariya, kariyāna, purakkhitvā, kāretvā. Aññānipi tumantādīni yojetabbāni.
anya-e0804n2:479_0: Tatra kaccāti katvā. Adhikaccāti adhikaṁ katvā. Akkharacintakā pana saddasatthanayaṁ
anya-e0804n2:479_1: nissāya “adhikicca” iti rūpaṁ icchanti, mayaṁ panetādisaṁ rūpaṁ pāḷiyā anukūlaṁ na
anya-e0804n2:479_2: hotīti na icchāma. Tathā hi therikāgāthāyaṁ gotamiyā parinibbānavacane “padakkhiṇaṁ
anya-e0804n2:479_3: kacca nipacca pāde”ti pāḷi dissati. Tattha hi padakkhiṇaṁ katvāti attho. Kaccāti
anya-e0804n2:479_4: padassa dassanena adhikaccāti padampi diṭṭhameva hoti, esa nayo aññatrāpi yathārahaṁ veditabbo.
anya-e0804n2:480: Idāni karotissa dhātussa appamattakaṁ atthātisayayogaṁ kathayāma – taṇhaṅkaro. Kāraṇā. Pharusāhi vācāhi pakrubbamāno. Sante na kurute piyanti.
anya-e0804n2:481_0: Tatra taṇhaṅkaroti veneyyānaṁ taṇhaṁ lobhaṁ karoti hiṁsatīti taṇhaṅkaro. Atha vā
anya-e0804n2:481_1: rūpakāyadhammakāyasampattiyā attani sakalalokassa taṇhaṁ sinehaṁ karoti janetīti
anya-e0804n2:481_2: taṇhaṅkaro. Kāraṇāti hiṁsanā. Pakrubbamānoti hiṁsamāno. Sante na kurute piyanti sappurise
anya-e0804n2:481_3: attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na karotīti attho. Atha vā piyaṁ piyāyamāno tussamāno
anya-e0804n2:481_4: modamāno sante na kurute na sevatīti attho. Yathā “rājānaṁ sevatī”ti etasmiṁ atthe
anya-e0804n2:481_5: rājānaṁ piyaṁ kuruteti saddasatthavidū mantenti, dullabhāyaṁ nīti sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0804n2:482_0: Ettha ca parikkhārasaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate, “parikkhāroti sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi
anya-e0804n2:482_1: suparikkhittaṁ hotī”tiādīsu parivāro vuccati. “Ratho setaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”tiādīsu
anya-e0804n2:482_2: alaṅkāro. “Ye cime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā”tiādīsu sambhāro. Etthetañhi vuccati –
anya-e0804n2:485: Jāgara niddakkhaye. Jāgaroti. Jāgaraṁ. Dīghā jāgarato ratti.
anya-e0804n2:486: Tanādī ettakā diṭṭhā, dhātavo me yathābalaṁ;
anya-e0804n2:493: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
